markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Strigoi Progenitor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1944)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The most powerful strigoi are those intentionally summoned into the bodies of willing hosts in times long past. As the rites to do so are lost to time, very few strigoi progenitors exist today. Those who do trace their lives back well over ten thousand years ago to Thassilon, Azlant, or similar ancient empires. A strigoi progenitor may appear to possess the vitality of the living, yet closer inspection reveals sharp fangs, the faintest smell of decay, and the strange and unsettling shifting of their shadow. In life, this example strigoi progenitor was a powerful oracle and advisor in Runelord Sorshen's nation of Eurythnia.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 36

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 34

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 31
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 13">[Strigoi Progenitor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1944)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Shadow" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=143" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
<trait label="Vampire" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=242" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Shadows at Sundown](/Sources.aspx?ID=121) pg. 60</row>

**Perception** +23; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Shadowtongue](/Languages.aspx?ID=21), [Thassilonian](/Languages.aspx?ID=52)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +25, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +23, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +23, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +26, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +27, [Thassilon Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +24

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +8

**Dex** +8

**Con** +5

**Int** +5

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +5
</row>

**Items**
_+1 [resilient](/Equipment.aspx?ID=279) [studded leather armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=5)_, [Religious Symbol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=41)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 34 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +26 

**Will** +22 

</row>

**HP** 180
(coffin restoration, [fast healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=15) 10, [negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), paralyze, [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [sleep](/Traits.aspx?ID=145)

**Resistances**
all physical 15 (except [magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103) [silver](/Equipment.aspx?ID=379) weapons or magical weapons shedding [bright light](/Rules.aspx?ID=407))

**Weaknesses**
strigoi

**Shadow Escape** <actions string="Free Action" /> 

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, fly 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claws +25 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103)),
**Damage** 3d8+14 slashing plus [Grab](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=18)

**Divine Spontaneous Spells** DC 33, attack +25, *Spells marked with an asterisk are signature spells; the strigoi progenitor may heighten these spells freely
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Sigil](/Spells.aspx?ID=286)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [_harm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=146)*, [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266) (3 slots)
- **2nd**
[Comprehend Language](/Spells.aspx?ID=46), [_dispel magic_](/Spells.aspx?ID=78)*, [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Undetectable Alignment](/Spells.aspx?ID=348) (3 slots)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [_chilling darkness_](/Spells.aspx?ID=36)*, [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (3 slots)
- **4th**
[Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86)*, [Remove Curse](/Spells.aspx?ID=250), [Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329) (3 slots)
- **5th**
[_flame strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=120)*, [Gentle Repose](/Spells.aspx?ID=131), [Sending](/Spells.aspx?ID=272), [Tongues](/Spells.aspx?ID=340) (3 slots)
- **6th**
[Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344), [_vampiric exsanguination_](/Spells.aspx?ID=353)*
- **7th**
[Eclipse Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=96), [Ethereal Jaunt](/Spells.aspx?ID=105), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116) (2 slots)

**Oracle Revelation Spell** DC 33, 1 Focus Point
- **7th**
[Brain Drain](/Spells.aspx?ID=747)

**Rituals** DC 33

- **2nd**
[Create Undead](/Rituals.aspx?ID=10)
- **6th**
[Planar Binding](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17)

**Oracle Mystery** [Lore](/Mysteries.aspx?ID=7)   

**Create Spawn**  ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Downtime](/Traits.aspx?ID=49), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) 

**Domain of Dusk** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)) 7d6 negative damage (DC 31 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save).

**Dominate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) DC 33

**Drink Essence** <actions string="Single Action" />  When drinking essence, the strigoi progenitor regains 18 HP.

**Shadow Form** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) 

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-314" />

text: Strigoi Progenitor The most powerful strigoi are those intentionally summoned into the bodies of willing hosts in times long past. As the rites to do so are lost to time, very few strigoi progenitors exist today. Those who do trace their lives back well over ten thousand years ago to Thassilon, Azlant, or similar ancient empires. A strigoi progenitor may appear to possess the vitality of the living, yet closer inspection reveals sharp fangs, the faintest smell of decay, and the strange and unsettling shifting of their shadow. In life, this example strigoi progenitor was a powerful oracle and advisor in Runelord Sorshen's nation of Eurythnia.
